<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Knowledge View">a16a7dca972971503c39f757f053af74</macroponent><name>article_actions/items</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[function evaluateProperty({
    api
}) {
    var items = [{
        "id": "copyLink",
        "label": api.state.copyLinkLabel
    }]
    if (api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails && api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails.showFlag)
        items.unshift({
            "id": "flag",
            "label": api.state.flagArticleLabel
        });
    return items;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-29 11:53:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>3d6a3d0e972971503c39f757f053afd0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>article_actions/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Magdas House" source="x_1027698_magdas_0">a70c2255972d7d103c39f757f053afe8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Magdas House">a70c2255972d7d103c39f757f053afe8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_3d6a3d0e972971503c39f757f053afd0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-29 11:53:20</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
